title: NO FEE-Available September 1 LARGE 2BR/1BA- 960ft-
posting_body: This great LARGE 2BR/ 1BA Top Floor Condo unit.

This unit features: Nice Layout, High Ceilings, Wood Floor, Brand New Countertops Granite Kitchen, Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Stove, Brand New Bathroom, Indoor Porch,No Smoking, 1 Parking Space, Heat and Hot Water Included, First and Security Deposit ONLY.
Beautiful Apartment in a Phenomenal Location.
